page.title: 18OUR COMMUNITY CONSTABLE
page.content: P.C.Green is our community constable.His beat covers Half Acres and Smawthorne Estates.He visits Smawthorne First and Middle Schools and also Half Acres First and Middle.He walks on his beat so he can talk to people.He tells us to lock our bikes up.He visits Highfield House to talk to the old people. P.C.Green wears a dark blue uniform with shiny buttons.He has a number which is on his shoulder. He has got a helmet and a pair of black boots. He has got a radio which he uses to communicate.P.C.Green calls it his 'talking pocket'.He carries a truncheon to protect himself. His interests are football,reading, collecting medals and taking photographs.
